paper_drawdown_safety_veto.reason: Safety mechanisms must function independently of capital reality

PAPER_ORDERS_SUBMITTED.risk_management_method: Percentage-based (3% SL, 6% TP) - standard for NEUTRAL regime verification trades

orders.rationale: ADBE er en kvalitets-software aksje i Technology-sektoren. Ved NEUTRAL regime er 3% SL tilstrekkelig for å håndtere normal volatilitet (ATR ~$10). 2:1 R:R sikrer positiv forventet verdi. Checkpoint-ordre for å verifisere LIVE-PAPER execution pipeline.

INTU er en etablert fintech/software-leder med stabil inntjening. Høyere pris betyr færre aksjer for samme notional eksponering. 3% SL = $16.48/aksje dekker typisk daglig volatilitet (ATR ~$13.67). Diversifiserer teknologi-eksponering med annen forretningsmodell enn ADBE.

PGR (Progressive Insurance) gir sektor-diversifisering til Financials. Forsikringssektoren har lav korrelasjon med teknologi. 3% SL passer godt med ATR ~$5.71. NEUTRAL regime favoriserer kvalitetsselskaper med defensiv profil.

GIS (General Mills) representerer Consumer Staples - defensiv sektor med lav beta. Ved NEUTRAL regime er dette en portefølje-stabiliserende posisjon. Lav ATR (~$0.82) gjør 3% SL (~$1.35) robust mot støy. Sektor-diversifisering reduserer total porteføljerisiko.

NOW (ServiceNow) er enterprise SaaS med sterke ARR-metrics. Gir teknologi-eksponering med annen kundebase (B2B enterprise) enn ADBE/INTU (prosumer/SMB). ATR ~$4.36 gjør 3% SL (~$4.05) veltilpasset. Completes 5-aksje checkpoint-kravet.

DATAPIPELINE_ARKITEKTUR._title: Komplett Datapipeline: Fra Input til Tradable Signal

fase_6_inversion_logikk.logic: IF asset in inversion_universe AND hit_rate = 0% → INVERT direction

fase_9_posisjon_sizing.input: Signal + Regime + Kelly fraction + DEFCON level

DATAPIPELINE_ARKITEKTUR.mermaid_diagram:
```mermaid
flowchart TB
    subgraph DATA_INGESTION["Fase 1: Data Inntak (IoS-001)"]
        YF[Yahoo Finance] --> DI[CDMO]
        ALPACA[Alpaca IEX] --> DI
        CG[CoinGecko] --> DI
        DI --> PM[(fhq_market)]
    end

    subgraph MACRO["Fase 2: Makro (IoS-016)"]
        PM --> EC[Economic Calendar]
        EC --> MM[(fhq_macro)]
    end

    subgraph TECHNICAL["Fase 3-4: Analyse (IoS-003/011)"]
        PM --> FINN[FINN]
        MM --> FINN
        FINN --> REGIME[Regime Engine]
        REGIME --> RD[(regime_daily)]
    end

    subgraph FORECAST["Fase 5-6: Forecast (IoS-005/012-B)"]
        RD --> FC[Forecast Gen]
        FC --> INV{Inversion?}
        INV -->|Yes| INVERT[Invert Direction]
        INV -->|No| PASS[Pass Through]
    end

    subgraph SIGNAL["Fase 7-8: Signal (IoS-007/008)"]
        INVERT --> GN[Golden Needles]
        PASS --> GN
        GN --> SH[Signal Handoff]
    end

    subgraph EXECUTION["Fase 9-11: Execution (IoS-012)"]
        SH --> CPTO[CPTO]
        CPTO --> SIZE[Position Sizing]
        SIZE --> EVAL{VEGA Gates}
        EVAL -->|PASS| LINE[LINE]
        EVAL -->|BLOCK| LOG[Block Log]
        LINE --> ALPACA_API[Alpaca API]
    end

    subgraph LEARNING["Fase 12-13: Learning (IoS-010)"]
        ALPACA_API --> BSS[(broker_state)]
        BSS --> SITC[SITC]
        SITC --> LEARN[(learning_attribution)]
    end
```

meta_analysis_industry_standard._title: Best Practice: Order Execution Authority in Automated Trading Systems

principle_1_separation_of_concerns.rule: Order execution should be isolated to a single, audited component
principle_1_separation_of_concerns.implementation: LINE (EC-005) via IoS-012 is the ONLY execution path
principle_1_separation_of_concerns.violation_type: CEO bypassed this by using Alpaca dashboard directly

principle_2_api_key_segregation.rule: API keys should only be accessible to authorized execution agents
industry_practice: Trading keys in HSM or secure vault
Only execution service has decrypt access
Human access requires 2-person approval + audit log
principle_2_api_key_segregation.fjordhq_gap: Alpaca dashboard accessible to CEO - should require LINE mediation

principle_3_circuit_breaker_pattern.rule: All order modifications must pass through governance gates
principle_3_circuit_breaker_pattern.fjordhq_current: Gates exist (VEGA) but manual dashboard bypass is possible

principle_4_reconciliation_loop.rule: Internal state must be continuously reconciled with broker state
principle_4_reconciliation_loop.fjordhq_gap: broker_state_snapshots taken but not used for active reconciliation

principle_5_emergency_override_protocol.rule: Human override should follow documented emergency procedure
principle_5_emergency_override_protocol.fjordhq_gap: CEO override happened without prior system logging

corrective_actions.action: Konfigurer ALPACA_PAPER_API_KEY i .env slik at LINE kan operere

corrective_actions.deliverable: Continuous sync between database and Alpaca

corrective_actions.requirement: Alle CEO overrides må logges FØR handling

corrective_actions.action: Vurder Alpaca dashboard tilgang for CEO

learning.description: CEO executed trades manually instead of through LINE (EC-005)
learning.root_cause: No automated execution path available due to missing credentials + hallucination
learning.prevention: Ensure LINE has credentials, implement reconciliation, log all overrides

requested_review: What controls should prevent future bypass?
